attributes.action: Peruse a replacement to the EU with the Commonwealth
attributes.background:
A replacement to the EU which is more global and does not make the mistakes of the EU is necessary.
A Commonwealth treaty could be signed to set up free trade, economic cooperation, military cooperation, etc. with our commonwealth friends - there'd be no common government which enforces regulation.

rejection.details: The open petition similar to yours is https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/138327
